landing.title: CleanCycle
landing.subtitle: Smart Laundry Management System
landing.description: Manage your laundry room efficiently with real-time machine tracking, smart scheduling, and automated notifications.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for efficient laundry management

realtime.title: Real-time Tracking
realtime.description: Monitor machine availability and status in real-time. Know exactly when machines are free.

scheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
scheduling.description: Reserve machines in advance and get notified when your time slot is ready.

notifications.title: Instant Notifications
notifications.description: Receive notifications when your laundry is done or when machines become available.

analytics.title: Usage Analytics
analytics.description: Track your laundry patterns and optimize your washing schedule.

multiRoom.title: Multiple Rooms
multiRoom.description: Manage multiple laundry rooms with different machines and schedules.

secure.title: Secure & Private
secure.description: Your data is encrypted and secure. We respect your privacy.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Join CleanCycle today and make laundry management effortless.

login.title: Sign In
login.subtitle: Welcome back to CleanCycle
login.emailNotConfirmed: Please verify your email first. Redirecting to verification page...

register.title: Create Account
register.subtitle: Join CleanCycle today
register.success: Account created successfully! Please verify your email.

validation.firstNameLetters: First name can only contain letters
validation.lastNameLetters: Last name can only contain letters
validation.usernameFormat: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
validation.roomNumberFormat: Room number must contain only numbers
validation.phoneNumberFormat: Please enter a valid phone number

verification.title: Verify Your Email
verification.subtitle: We've sent a 6-digit code to your email
verification.codeHint: Enter the 6-digit code from your email
verification.resendSuccess: New verification code sent to your email!
verification.resendError: Failed to resend code. Please try again.
verification.success: Email verified successfully! Redirecting to login...
verification.expired: Verification code has expired. Please request a new one.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
forgotPassword.success: Password reset link sent! Check your email.
forgotPassword.error: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.

resetPassword.title: Create New Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password
resetPassword.success: Password reset successfully! You can now sign in.
resetPassword.error: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
resetPassword.tokenExpired: Reset link has expired. Please request a new one.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
